price: 16. Zij zullen bedekkingen van vuur boven hen hebben en bedekkingen (van vuur) beneden hen, hiermee beangstigt Allah Zijn dienaren: “O Mijn dienaren, vrees Mij”.
arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحۡتِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lahum min fawqihim ẓulalun mina al-nāri wamin taḥtihim ẓulalun dhālika yukhawwifu al-lahu bihi ʿibādahu yāʿibādi fa-ittaqūni
